content.body: dlrobertson: I think whatever makes the spec clearer / easy to follow. Though there's also some value in matching implementations, if that is sufficiently easy to follow

content.body: dlrobertson: I consider splitting something if it would end up with two callers, and definitely do it if there's more callers than that

dlrobertson: I consider splitting something if it would end up with two callers, and definitely do it if there's more callers than that

content.body: dlrobertson: and yeah, sometimes it can greatly benefit readability even if there's only a single caller, so as with most things there's a lot of "it depends" :-)
